text:
I'm Looking for
Woman, 18 years and older
ğŸ’I know very well that love has no rules, I am not looking for a perfect woman but a real girl, who, like me, wants a serious relationship. Love has no barriers, that's why I'm not looking for a specific physique or nationality, I'm willing to travel. People tend to pretend or lie to be liked, I look for their true personality that comes from their heart, because I always show the man I am, can we take this to the real world? âœˆï¸âœˆï¸âœˆï¸
